column4: are there any other terminal-based text editor than vim? I'm using ssh to my school and want to edit a file
nano, pico, emacs, sed/cat/awk for manual line editing

I just upgraded to 8.10 and my second monitor won't turn on anymore.  ATI Radeon graphics card, restored my existing xorg.conf that I backed up, with no effect.  I'm also stuck at 800x600 resolution.  What can I do?
